text:
me appliance came to look at my LG fridge . he could not find anything wrong and just told me that it was getting hot air inside.than he would say LG does not let us know too much about the product you will need to call LG.told me i left the door open and i know better the door has an alarm i think i can still hear.well after the repair guy told me i would have to call LG cause he did not know about them i ask what if we change the seal? he told me they could not get that part.so ok i had to pay for him to tell me he did not know about LG products $80 ripoff.
NEVER CALL MR APPLIANCE
i called the office to let them know and they told me they could get the part that is would just take time .
for a seal 1 seal just  labor to change a seal is $181 and will take 2 hours for 1 seal somebody does not know what they are doing plus i would have to pay for the part. so if i change all 4 seals on the fridge it would take them all day.
NEVER CALL MR APPLIANCE THEY DO NOT KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT LG

text: Called Mr. Appliance today told them what I needed and  I was given a time frame of when a serviceman would be coming out.  Within 1 hour I received a phone call a serviceman was on his way.  Very professional and explained everything that was going on with the gasket for my freezer.  Had no idea the gaskets come with magnets and the way they are packaged many of the magnets are broke.  The serviceman aligned the door gasket and the freezer is functioning.  Asked for their business card because I know I will be calling them again.  The bill was very reasonable too!

text: Not sure why anyone would use this company or any company to be honest. With the internet today, most repairs can be handled effectively and cheaply. Technician was nice enough, but he bilked her just like the other people on here. Do some research before you call or write a review about a company. I'm guessing the majority of their customers are clumsy people and the elderly.

resp.text: Billy,  I apologize you feel our services are not of value. We service thousands of people in the Birmingham area each year and take pride in our customer service. name: Donna Pike
text:
After a frustrating day of searching for someone to fix my Kenmore Elite fridge, made by LG, a friend recommended Mr. Appliance,ie, Jeremy Cowan.
Jeremy came, on time, he was so respectful of us and our home.
I cannot tell you how refreshing it was to have Jeremy here to fix our fridge.
No mumbo-jumbo!
He diagnosed the problem,  gave us the price, let us decide, ordered the parts on Wednesday, back today, Friday, fixed the problems, fast efficient, all the right tools, but most of all, knowledgeable,  so nice, answered all of our questions, and assured us, if we have any problems or questions do not hesitate to call the office.
As he left, Tim and I were satisfied and happy, and grateful.
We hope Jeremy is a valued employee, we value him and Mr. Appliance!!
The office personnel is also outstanding!
Kept us updated on times.
I wish your name included location, Mr. Appliance in Irondale.
Donna Pike
440 East Ventura drive.
Irondale.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great review as well as your business, Donna! Jeremy is a great asset to our team and we are lucky to have him. I will most certainly relay these kind words to him. Please let us know if you need anything in the future!

name: Dawn DeGweck
text: while friendly, the service was not helpful. The technician who came to fix my oven diagnosed the problem as several internal fuses nonfunctioning and the control panel needing replacement. After waiting four weeks with no oven working, I was told that they could not locate a control pane, and it was on backorder, which could take through July. The bill would be close to $700. I called another local company. The technician pulled out my stove from the wall and found the connector cord had failed. If an electrical appliance does not work, don't we need to see if the power is connected? He replaced the cord. The oven works. the bill was about $200. Work accomplished in one business day. Shoddy work, Mr. Appliance.

name: Misty Ary
text:
Okay, so I had an appointment with this company today. I rushed home to make sure that I would be here on time, which I was. I waited and waited and nobody showed up. I called to confirm that they were coming and the receptionist assured me that they would call when they were on their way. Another 2 hours went by and still no call and no service person. Then, I called again and the receptionist told me the same thing. It is now 9 PM at night and not a single call or service person. This is BEYOND unprofessional. I WOULD NOT recommend.

Update: At 9:06 PM someone from the company called me and apologized. Said that somehow the tech wasn't notified of the service call. I had made the appointment the week prior, so I'm not sure how that happens. I appreciate the call to apologize, but I still would not recommend them. I had to rearrange my whole afternoon to be here during their "time frame" and then sat here waiting.

The Reagins

text: Amazing 5 Star, white glove service! Witten(service tech) was the most personable, professional, knowledgeable technician I have ever worked with! He arrived to my parents door less than 2 hours after contacting Mr. Appliance when another company could not make the appointment that had been set up a week in advance! Most repairs are same day or next day. No charge for service call.  Repair quote was given before repair. Competitive, reasonable pricing. He was able to diagnose and fix the repair in less than 15 minutes! Called Mr. Appliance at 8:30am and my parent's Kennmore icemaker was working by 10:45am. One year warranty on labor and parts. They stand behind their work. Very impressed! I will be calling Mr. Appliance Over the Mountain for all of my family's future appliance repair needs. You will not be disappointed! I did not receive any compensation or discount for my review. Honest, dependable company that cares about their customers and the service they provide. Thank you Witten and Mr. Appliance for taking such great care of our appliance repair needs! -Tim & Nancy Layfield from Pinson, Alabama
